questions.question: Which statement MOST accurately describes how to interact with AWS CloudFormation and the AWS Cloud Development Kit (AWS CDK)?
options: CloudFormation templates can be written using common programming languages, such as Python, TypeScript, Java, C#, and Go.
The AWS CDK can be used to generate CloudFormation templates.
The AWS CDK can be used to write CloudFormation templates in either JSON or YAML.
CloudFormation can be used to launch AWS CDK applications to provision resources.
correct_answers: The AWS CDK can be used to generate CloudFormation templates.
